page.title: 14THE CUB SCOUTS IN CORBRIDGE
page.content: Thursday night,6.30 and the 1st. Tynedale(Corbridge) Cub Scout Pack meets at St.Helen's First School. Akela welcomes two new boys and calls the Pack to order.The four leaders inspect the thirty Cubs uniforms before the meeting begins.Tonight the Cubs have to follow a route set by Akela.The four groups meet at the Market Place where Baloo explains the next game _ to bring back to school items with initials which make up "Cubscouts".Back at school,one cub reads his 100 word story as part of his Bronze Arrow work and another talks about his "Fisrt Issues" stamp collection for his Collectors Badge. At 8 o'clock Akela reads a Prayer. The Sixers stay behind for a Sixer's Council and plans are made for the trip to Newcastle Airport in December.
